column1: Skorgrím Dourhand is a Dwarf of the Dourhands created specifically for The Lord of the Rings Online.
Skorgrím Dourhand is descended from ancient dwarf-lords who ruled one of the great kingdoms of the Blue Mountains
column2: a realm that has long since fallen into ruin. His people became scattered and declined in number
column3: but poverty and dishonour bred within them a great greed and lust for power. When the Elves of Grey Havens founded the refuge of Edhelion
column5: Skorgrím sought to rob them of their relics and treasures. He rallied the remnants of his people and laid siege to Edhelion. Worse yet
column6: he had paid Goblins and Trolls to assist him
column7: something of which no honourable Dwarf would conceive. His evil ways brought him to ruin

column1: Six hundred years later Ivar the Blood-Hand
column2: a Gaunt-lord and a vile necromancer from the First Age
column3: summoned a fell spirit which entered the preserved corpse of Skorgrím and raised it as a wight. The dark realm of Angmar used this creature to turn the Dourhands entirely to evil
column4: leading them to believe that the creature was indeed Skorgrím reborn
column5: to lead them to wealth and glory. Now the Dourhands serve Angmar
column6: under the rule of the creature they know as Skorgrím.
